dmca.title: Signed Report of Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Sally Jennings [mailto:english99tutor@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2007 11:29 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Signed Report of Copyright Violation

 

Hi, 
I own and run a website for English as a Second Language learning at
www.speak-read-write.com <http://www.speak-read-write.com/> . I have
copyright statements on all the pages of my site. 

I write all the materials on my site. They are original, and I hold the
copyright.

A site you serve, www.teslcafe.com <http://www.teslcafe.com/>  has
stolen a page of my site I wrote and republished it without my
permission. 

We have blocked their link to my mp3 (a reading of the page) in our
.htaccess file today. 

Their page posting the material they stole from me is
http://www.teslcafe.com/node/44 (entitled "I Am So Sorry for Your Loss,
You Have My Deepest Sympathy")

My page showing this material as mine is
http://www.speak-read-write.com/sympathy.html (entitled "I Am So Sorry
for Your Loss, You Have My Deepest Sympathy")

Thanks for doing whatever you can about this. 

Sally Jennings 
www.speak-read-write.com <http://www.speak-read-write.com/>  
(604)435-3306
english99tutor@yahoo.com



Sally Jennings
http://www.speak-read-write.com

  

________________________________

.com/unlimited/>
